question: Prime Minister Narendra Modi launched RuPay Card phase-2 in which neighbouring country?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi along with his Bhutanese counterpart Lotay Tshering has recently launched RuPay card Phase-II, in a virtual mode.
This will allow Bhutanese card holders to access the RuPay network in India. Last year during the visit of Prime Minister Modi to Bhutan, Phase-I of the project was launched, by which visitors from India can access ATMs and Point of Sale (PoS) terminals across Bhutan.
